title.main:
liveclinic —
modern clinic of psychological counseling

about.title: About the project
about.firstText: liveclinic — this is a team of like-minded people, united by common professional values and views on the provision of truly high-quality and honest psychological counseling services.
about.secondText: We strive to create the best conditions for the development of specialists so that our clients receive the best specialized assistance.

methods.title: Working methods
methods.subtitle: In our work, we use rational and scientifically based paradigms

items.name: ST
items.title: Schema Therapy
items.description: this therapy is intended to work with patients for whom cognitive-behavioral therapy methods are ineffective, as well as for the treatment of major depressive and post-traumatic disorders and other psychological problems in individuals and couples.

items.name: АСТ
items.title: Acceptance and Responsibility Therapy
items.description: unlike traditional cognitive-behavioral psychotherapy, ACT teaches not to change or control your thoughts, experiences, feelings, but to notice and accept them, even if they are unpleasant. Ideal for long, consistent and deep work.

items.name: IFS
items.title: Systemic Family Therapy
items.description: a method of solving the mental and psychological problems of a person, and especially children, through the study of relationships in the family and the impact on these relationships. In this approach, a person is not an object of influence and a client. The client is the whole family, the whole family system, it is she who is the object of psychotherapeutic influence.

items.name: СВТ
items.title:
Cognitive Behavioral
Therapy
items.description: a method that helps to identify and change ineffective habits (patterns) associated with thinking, behavior, relationships with others, to more useful ones. CBT, unlike other forms of psychotherapy, focuses not on past traumas, but on current problems and how to solve them.

items.name: CFT
items.title:
Compassion Focused
Therapy
items.description: the model uses evolutionary psychology, attachment science, behaviorism, and classical cognitive behavioral therapy. CFT was originally designed for use with patients who suffer from high levels of shame and self-criticism and respond poorly to standard CBT protocols.

items.text: We will formulate a pragmatic strategy for overcoming crises of a completely different profile and statute of limitations
We will help to integrate the «past» into the «present» for a qualitative change in our «future»
We will help you get out of destructive relationships: relationships with an abuser, co-dependent relationships, etc.
Together with you, we will identify the main problem areas in a short time

We will support you in your
accomplishments
Let us help you make decisions that suit you
Let us introduce you to yourself again
